payload.name: event-sourcing
payload.title: Event sourcing: model system as sequence of decisions, not hidden state mutation
payload.formal:
state is a fold over events:
[
state_t = fold(apply, state_0, events_{0:t})
]
payload.apm2_mapping: this is literally APM2’s kernel: ledger events + deterministic reducers. Operationally: “the truth” is the event stream + CAS. Everything else is a projection.
